overview: Three senior citizens in their 70s who live together are slowly decaying in endless days with nothing to do but feed the birds. One of them comes up with an idea - rob a bank. They certainly could use the money if they get away with it and if they are caught, what could happen to three old men?
tagline: Whether they win or lose, they'll be "Going in Style"
cast: George Burns|Art Carney|Lee Strasberg|Charles Hallahan|Pamela Payton-Wright
